trans-unit.source: Common base class and contract for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider" /> objects, which are factories that execute some queries to produce a single object or a list of objects that you can use as binding source objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider" /> 对象的公共基类和协定，它们是执行某些查询以生成可以用作绑定源对象的单个对象或对象列表的工厂。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> is a convenience wrapper around an existing data model; it does not replace any data model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> 为方便起见包装现有的数据模型;它不会替换任何数据模型。

trans-unit.source: A data provider does not attempt to condense the complexity and versatility of a data model such as ADO into one single object with a few properties.
trans-unit.target: 数据提供程序不会尝试将数据模型，如 ADO 具有几个属性的单个对象到复杂多样。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> 是一个抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the derived classes, which are <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 使用的派生类，这些类之一<xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> is aware of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] threading and dispatcher model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>感知[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]线程处理和调度程序模型。

trans-unit.source: It assumes the thread at creation time to be the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: 它在创建时为假定线程[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程。

trans-unit.source: Events will get marshaled from a worker thread to the UI thread of the application.
trans-unit.target: 事件将从封送工作线程到应用程序的 UI 线程。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This is a protected constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个受保护的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that initialization of this object is about to begin; no implicit <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh" /> occurs until the matched <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.EndInit" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示即将开始初始化此对象；在调用匹配的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh" /> 方法前不要进行隐式 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.EndInit" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this base class calls this method when <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad" /> or <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写此基类时，如果已调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh" />，那么此基类会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The base class delays the call if refresh is deferred or initial load is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果刷新发生延迟或已禁用初始加载，则基类会延迟调用。

trans-unit.source: **Notes to Implementers:** You can choose to execute the query on the same thread or on a background thread or using `IsAsynchronous`.
trans-unit.target: **注意事項：**可以选择以执行查询，在同一线程或后台线程或使用`IsAsynchronous`。

trans-unit.source: When the query is complete, call <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.OnQueryFinished%2A> to have the public properties updated.
trans-unit.target: 查询完成后，调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.OnQueryFinished%2A>具有更新的公共属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying data object.
trans-unit.target: 获取基础数据对象。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the underlying data object.
trans-unit.target: 属于基础数据对象的类型 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> is used as the source of a binding, this is the resulting binding source object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>使用作为绑定源时，这是生成的绑定源对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data" /> property has a new value.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data" /> 属性具有一个新值时发生。

trans-unit.source: **Notes to implementers:** Raise this event when a new data object becomes available on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **注意事項：**引发此事件时，便可以在新的数据对象<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to change properties of the provider and delay automatic refresh.
trans-unit.target: 进入延迟循环，该循环可用于更改提供程序的属性并延迟自动刷新。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于释放调用对象的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple property changes within the scope.
trans-unit.target: 典型用法就是创建`using`范围使用此方法，然后在范围内进行多个属性更改。

trans-unit.source: This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.
trans-unit.target: 这会延迟自动刷新，直到退出延迟循环循环。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> object to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 线程当前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> object to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread to use.
trans-unit.target: 当前<see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />对象传递给[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程使用。

trans-unit.source: By default, this is the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> object that is associated with the thread on which this instance was created.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这是与创建此实例的线程关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the initialization of this object has completed; this causes a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh" /> if no other <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh" /> is outstanding.
trans-unit.target: 表示此对象的初始化已完成；如果没有其他未完成的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh" />，则这会导致 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error of the last query operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取最新查询操作的错误。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that is the error of the last query operation, or <see langword="null" /> if there was no error.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 类型的值，它是最新查询操作的错误，如果没有错误，则该值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Starts the initial query to the underlying data model.
trans-unit.target: 启动对基础数据模型的初始查询。

trans-unit.source: The result is returned on the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 结果返回到 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by the binding engine when dependent data bindings are activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活相关的数据绑定，此方法通常由绑定引擎中调用。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.IsInitialLoadEnabled%2A> to `false` to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.IsInitialLoadEnabled%2A>到`false`以防止或延迟的数据自动加载。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A> method can be called multiple times.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A>可以多次调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The provider ignores subsequent calls once it is busy executing the initial query; the provider does not restart an already running query when <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A> is called again.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序将忽略后续调用后正忙于执行初始查询;提供程序不会重新启动已在运行查询时<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A>会再次调用。

trans-unit.source: When the query finishes successfully, any <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A> call still does not re-query data.
trans-unit.target: 在查询完成后成功，任何<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A>调用仍不会重新查询数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A> operation is typically asynchronous, a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged> event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property assumed a new value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A>操作通常是异步的<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>引发事件时<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性采用新值。

trans-unit.source: The application calls <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> to cause a refresh of the data.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>会导致的数据刷新。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否阻止或延迟数据自动加载。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要阻止或延迟数据自动加载，则为 <see langword="false" />；否则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> runs its query and sets its <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property the first time it is used by a binding or a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
trans-unit.target: 通常<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>运行其查询并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性绑定使用的第一个时间或<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>。

trans-unit.source: You can omit this step by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.IsInitialLoadEnabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以忽略此步骤，通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.IsInitialLoadEnabled%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> to cause the provider to obtain its data.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，应用程序必须显式调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>导致要获取其数据的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is an outstanding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh" /> in use.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否有某个未完成的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh" /> 正在运行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is an outstanding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh" /> in use; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有某个未完成的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh" /> 正在运行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: **Notes to implementers:** To get the best use out of refresh deferral, do not call <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> when this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: **注意事項：**若要获得超出刷新延迟最佳使用，不要调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>当此属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: 要引发事件的自变量。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.PropertyChanged" /> event with the provided arguments.
trans-unit.target: 引发带有提供的参数的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.PropertyChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.
trans-unit.target: 派生类调用此方法以指示查询已完成。

trans-unit.source: The data that is the result of the query.
trans-unit.target: 作为查询结果的数据。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.
trans-unit.target: 派生类调用此方法以指示查询已完成。

trans-unit.source: This callback can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: 可以从任何线程调用此回调。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marshals back the result to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread before setting any of the public properties and before raising any events.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将封送回将结果发送到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程设置任何公共属性以及前引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: The data that is the result of the query.
trans-unit.target: 作为查询结果的数据。

trans-unit.source: The error that occurred while running the query.
trans-unit.target: 在运行查询期间发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: This value is <see langword="null" /> if there is no error.
trans-unit.target: 如果未发生错误，此值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional delegate that is used to execute completion work on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread, for example, to set additional properties.
trans-unit.target: 用于对 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 线程执行完成工作的可选委托，如设置其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Optional arguments to send as a parameter with the <c>completionWork</c> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 要作为形参与 <c>completionWork</c> 委托一起发送的可选实参。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.
trans-unit.target: 派生类调用此方法以指示查询已完成。

trans-unit.source: This callback can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: 可以从任何线程调用此回调。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marshals back the result to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread before setting any of the public properties and before raising any events.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将封送回将结果发送到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程设置任何公共属性以及前引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 在属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a refresh operation to the underlying data model.
trans-unit.target: 启动对基础数据模型的刷新操作。

trans-unit.source: The result is returned on the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 结果返回到 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: A refresh operation is typically asynchronous, a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged> event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property assumed a new value.
trans-unit.target: 刷新操作通常是异步的<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>引发事件时<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性采用新值。

trans-unit.source: If the refresh operation fails, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property is set to `null`; the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Error%2A> property is set with the error exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果刷新操作失败，<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性设置为`null`;<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Error%2A>属性设置使用的错误异常。

trans-unit.source: The application can call <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> while a previous refresh is still underway.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>仍在进行上次刷新时。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> twice raises the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged> event twice.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>两次引发<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>事件两次。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不能在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不能在代码中直接使用。
